question: William has 9 tubes of green paint and 10 tubes of white paint. Matt has one third as many tubes of green paint as William, and five times as many tubes of white paint as William. How many tubes of paint does Matt have?
answer:
Matt has 9*1/3= <<9*1/3=3>>3 tubes of green paint
Matt has 10*5=<<10*5=50>>50 tubes of white paint
Matt has a total of 3+50 =<<3+50=53>>53 tubes of paint
#### 53
